content.raw: ya I don't know if there's an efficient solution other than polling to get all advertised topics and manually checking to see if anything's changed. It would be nice to have something like the introspection functionality that signals if there're new changes. We also probably don't want to spend time implementing new features for the current transport layer though. I'll ticket an issue for the palette topic refresh issue for now
